# PROVINCE = Scope of any province in the region that is to be checked
# PERCENT = 0-1 float
# Tooltip is autogenerated when used
# Example:
#owns_percent_of_region = {
#    PROVINCE = "p:373" # Macedonia region
#    PERCENT = "0.75"
#}
owns_percent_of_region = {
	hidden:$PROVINCE$ = {
		trigger_if = {
			limit = {
				$PERCENT$ = 0.05
			}
			custom_tooltip = {
				text = mission_region_percent_5_tooltip
				region = {
					any_region_province = {
						percent >= $PERCENT$
						exists = owner
						OR = {
							owner = root
							owner = { is_subject_of = ROOT }
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					$PERCENT$ = 0.1
					$PERCENT$ = 0.10
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = {
				text = mission_region_percent_10_tooltip
				region = {
					any_region_province = {
						percent >= $PERCENT$
						exists = owner
						OR = {
							owner = root
							owner = { is_subject_of = ROOT }
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = {
				$PERCENT$ = 0.15
			}
			custom_tooltip = {
				text = mission_region_percent_15_tooltip
				region = {
					any_region_province = {
						percent >= $PERCENT$
						exists = owner
						OR = {
							owner = root
							owner = { is_subject_of = ROOT }
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					$PERCENT$ = 0.2
					$PERCENT$ = 0.20
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = {
				text = mission_region_percent_20_tooltip
				region = {
					any_region_province = {
						percent >= $PERCENT$
						exists = owner
						OR = {
							owner = root
							owner = { is_subject_of = ROOT }
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = {
				$PERCENT$ = 0.25
			}
			custom_tooltip = {
				text = mission_region_percent_25_tooltip
				region = {
					any_region_province = {
						percent >= $PERCENT$
						exists = owner
						OR = {
							owner = root
							owner = { is_subject_of = ROOT }
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					$PERCENT$ = 0.3
					$PERCENT$ = 0.30
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = {
				text = mission_region_percent_30_tooltip
				region = {
					any_region_province = {
						percent >= $PERCENT$
						exists = owner
						OR = {
							owner = root
							owner = { is_subject_of = ROOT }
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = {
				$PERCENT$ = 0.35
			}
			custom_tooltip = {
				text = mission_region_percent_35_tooltip
				region = {
					any_region_province = {
						percent >= $PERCENT$
						exists = owner
						OR = {
							owner = root
							owner = { is_subject_of = ROOT }
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					$PERCENT$ = 0.4
					$PERCENT$ = 0.40
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = {
				text = mission_region_percent_40_tooltip
				region = {
					any_region_province = {
						percent >= $PERCENT$
						exists = owner
						OR = {
							owner = root
							owner = { is_subject_of = ROOT }
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = {
				$PERCENT$ = 0.45
			}
			custom_tooltip = {
				text = mission_region_percent_45_tooltip
				region = {
					any_region_province = {
						percent >= $PERCENT$
						exists = owner
						OR = {
							owner = root
							owner = { is_subject_of = ROOT }
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					$PERCENT$ = 0.5
					$PERCENT$ = 0.50
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = {
				text = mission_region_percent_50_tooltip
				region = {
					any_region_province = {
						percent >= $PERCENT$
						exists = owner
						OR = {
							owner = root
							owner = { is_subject_of = ROOT }
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = {
				$PERCENT$ = 0.55
			}
			custom_tooltip = {
				text = mission_region_percent_55_tooltip
				region = {
					any_region_province = {
						percent >= $PERCENT$
						exists = owner
						OR = {
							owner = root
							owner = { is_subject_of = ROOT }
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					$PERCENT$ = 0.6
					$PERCENT$ = 0.60
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = {
				text = mission_region_percent_60_tooltip
				region = {
					any_region_province = {
						percent >= $PERCENT$
						exists = owner
						OR = {
							owner = root
							owner = { is_subject_of = ROOT }
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = {
				$PERCENT$ = 0.65
			}
			custom_tooltip = {
				text = mission_region_percent_65_tooltip
				region = {
					any_region_province = {
						percent >= $PERCENT$
						exists = owner
						OR = {
							owner = root
							owner = { is_subject_of = ROOT }
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					$PERCENT$ = 0.7
					$PERCENT$ = 0.70
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = {
				text = mission_region_percent_70_tooltip
				region = {
					any_region_province = {
						percent >= $PERCENT$
						exists = owner
						OR = {
							owner = root
							owner = { is_subject_of = ROOT }
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = {
				$PERCENT$ = 0.75
			}
			custom_tooltip = {
				text = mission_region_percent_75_tooltip
				region = {
					any_region_province = {
						percent >= $PERCENT$
						exists = owner
						OR = {
							owner = root
							owner = { is_subject_of = ROOT }
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					$PERCENT$ = 0.8
					$PERCENT$ = 0.80
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = {
				text = mission_region_percent_80_tooltip
				region = {
					any_region_province = {
						percent >= $PERCENT$
						exists = owner
						OR = {
							owner = root
							owner = { is_subject_of = ROOT }
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = {
				$PERCENT$ = 0.85
			}
			custom_tooltip = {
				text = mission_region_percent_85_tooltip
				region = {
					any_region_province = {
						percent >= $PERCENT$
						exists = owner
						OR = {
							owner = root
							owner = { is_subject_of = ROOT }
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					$PERCENT$ = 0.9
					$PERCENT$ = 0.90
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = {
				text = mission_region_percent_90_tooltip
				region = {
					any_region_province = {
						percent >= $PERCENT$
						exists = owner
						OR = {
							owner = root
							owner = { is_subject_of = ROOT }
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = {
				$PERCENT$ = 0.95
			}
			custom_tooltip = {
				text = mission_region_percent_95_tooltip
				region = {
					any_region_province = {
						percent >= $PERCENT$
						exists = owner
						OR = {
							owner = root
							owner = { is_subject_of = ROOT }
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

# PROVINCE = Scope of any province in the area that is to be checked
# PERCENT = 0-1 float
# Tooltip is autogenerated when used
# Example:
#owns_percent_of_area = {
#    PROVINCE = "p:373" # Macedonia area
#    PERCENT = "0.75"
#}
owns_percent_of_area = {
	hidden:$PROVINCE$ = {
		trigger_if = {
			limit = {
				$PERCENT$ = 0.05
			}
			custom_tooltip = {
				text = mission_area_percent_5_tooltip
				area = {
					any_area_province = {
						percent >= $PERCENT$
						exists = owner
						OR = {
							owner = root
							owner = { is_subject_of = ROOT }
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					$PERCENT$ = 0.1
					$PERCENT$ = 0.10
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = {
				text = mission_area_percent_10_tooltip
				area = {
					any_area_province = {
						percent >= $PERCENT$
						exists = owner
						OR = {
							owner = root
							owner = { is_subject_of = ROOT }
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = {
				$PERCENT$ = 0.15
			}
			custom_tooltip = {
				text = mission_area_percent_15_tooltip
				area = {
					any_area_province = {
						percent >= $PERCENT$
						exists = owner
						OR = {
							owner = root
							owner = { is_subject_of = ROOT }
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					$PERCENT$ = 0.2
					$PERCENT$ = 0.20
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = {
				text = mission_area_percent_20_tooltip
				area = {
					any_area_province = {
						percent >= $PERCENT$
						exists = owner
						OR = {
							owner = root
							owner = { is_subject_of = ROOT }
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = {
				$PERCENT$ = 0.25
			}
			custom_tooltip = {
				text = mission_area_percent_25_tooltip
				area = {
					any_area_province = {
						percent >= $PERCENT$
						exists = owner
						OR = {
							owner = root
							owner = { is_subject_of = ROOT }
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					$PERCENT$ = 0.3
					$PERCENT$ = 0.30
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = {
				text = mission_area_percent_30_tooltip
				area = {
					any_area_province = {
						percent >= $PERCENT$
						exists = owner
						OR = {
							owner = root
							owner = { is_subject_of = ROOT }
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = {
				$PERCENT$ = 0.35
			}
			custom_tooltip = {
				text = mission_area_percent_35_tooltip
				area = {
					any_area_province = {
						percent >= $PERCENT$
						exists = owner
						OR = {
							owner = root
							owner = { is_subject_of = ROOT }
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					$PERCENT$ = 0.4
					$PERCENT$ = 0.40
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = {
				text = mission_area_percent_40_tooltip
				area = {
					any_area_province = {
						percent >= $PERCENT$
						exists = owner
						OR = {
							owner = root
							owner = { is_subject_of = ROOT }
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = {
				$PERCENT$ = 0.45
			}
			custom_tooltip = {
				text = mission_area_percent_45_tooltip
				area = {
					any_area_province = {
						percent >= $PERCENT$
						exists = owner
						OR = {
							owner = root
							owner = { is_subject_of = ROOT }
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					$PERCENT$ = 0.5
					$PERCENT$ = 0.50
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = {
				text = mission_area_percent_50_tooltip
				area = {
					any_area_province = {
						percent >= $PERCENT$
						exists = owner
						OR = {
							owner = root
							owner = { is_subject_of = ROOT }
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = {
				$PERCENT$ = 0.55
			}
			custom_tooltip = {
				text = mission_area_percent_55_tooltip
				area = {
					any_area_province = {
						percent >= $PERCENT$
						exists = owner
						OR = {
							owner = root
							owner = { is_subject_of = ROOT }
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					$PERCENT$ = 0.6
					$PERCENT$ = 0.60
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = {
				text = mission_area_percent_60_tooltip
				area = {
					any_area_province = {
						percent >= $PERCENT$
						exists = owner
						OR = {
							owner = root
							owner = { is_subject_of = ROOT }
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = {
				$PERCENT$ = 0.65
			}
			custom_tooltip = {
				text = mission_area_percent_65_tooltip
				area = {
					any_area_province = {
						percent >= $PERCENT$
						exists = owner
						OR = {
							owner = root
							owner = { is_subject_of = ROOT }
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					$PERCENT$ = 0.7
					$PERCENT$ = 0.70
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = {
				text = mission_area_percent_70_tooltip
				area = {
					any_area_province = {
						percent >= $PERCENT$
						exists = owner
						OR = {
							owner = root
							owner = { is_subject_of = ROOT }
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = {
				$PERCENT$ = 0.75
			}
			custom_tooltip = {
				text = mission_area_percent_75_tooltip
				area = {
					any_area_province = {
						percent >= $PERCENT$
						exists = owner
						OR = {
							owner = root
							owner = { is_subject_of = ROOT }
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					$PERCENT$ = 0.8
					$PERCENT$ = 0.80
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = {
				text = mission_area_percent_80_tooltip
				area = {
					any_area_province = {
						percent >= $PERCENT$
						exists = owner
						OR = {
							owner = root
							owner = { is_subject_of = ROOT }
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = {
				$PERCENT$ = 0.85
			}
			custom_tooltip = {
				text = mission_area_percent_85_tooltip
				area = {
					any_area_province = {
						percent >= $PERCENT$
						exists = owner
						OR = {
							owner = root
							owner = { is_subject_of = ROOT }
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					$PERCENT$ = 0.9
					$PERCENT$ = 0.90
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = {
				text = mission_area_percent_90_tooltip
				area = {
					any_area_province = {
						percent >= $PERCENT$
						exists = owner
						OR = {
							owner = root
							owner = { is_subject_of = ROOT }
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = {
				$PERCENT$ = 0.95
			}
			custom_tooltip = {
				text = mission_area_percent_95_tooltip
				area = {
					any_area_province = {
						percent >= $PERCENT$
						exists = owner
						OR = {
							owner = root
							owner = { is_subject_of = ROOT }
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

# This trigger should be used in all mission tasks that require a province to build a building.
has_no_ongoing_construction = {
	trigger_if = {
	    limit = { has_construction = yes }
	    custom_tooltip = {
	        text = province_has_no_construction_tooltip
	        has_construction  = no
	    }
	}
}
